item.title: R to @sally_sound: When a single ‘ahem’ speaks volumes 😄😄😄
item.dc:creator: @HaroldHeathDJ
item.description: When a single ‘ahem’ speaks volumes 😄😄😄

item.title: Most dance music duos consist of a raging party-beast & a studio nerd tied together in a symbiotic relationship. Neither could achieve success without the other as the SN can’t network & isn’t sure what works on the dance floor & the RPB can't be arsed to properly learn Ableton
item.dc:creator: @HaroldHeathDJ
item.description: Most dance music duos consist of a raging party-beast & a studio nerd tied together in a symbiotic relationship. Neither could achieve success without the other as the SN can’t network & isn’t sure what works on the dance floor & the RPB can't be arsed to properly learn Ableton

item.title: R to @ndajz: & thank you for taking the time to say something so lovely 🙂❤️
item.dc:creator: @HaroldHeathDJ
item.description: & thank you for taking the time to say something so lovely 🙂❤️

item.title: There aren’t many music books that made me cry but @juderogers ‘The Sound of Being Human’ did. It’s beautiful, moving but also full of joy too, highly recommended if you love music or if you have a soul 🙂
item.dc:creator: @HaroldHeathDJ
item.description: There aren’t many music books that made me cry but @juderogers ‘The Sound of Being Human’ did. It’s beautiful, moving but also full of joy too, highly recommended if you love music or if you have a soul 🙂

item.title: Thanks dude, glad you enjoyed it and hope you’re ok post~hospital too ✊🏻🙂

item.title:
RT by @HaroldHeathDJ: ‘Show Me Love’ demonstrated just how commercially successful vocal house music could be – how a decent song with dancefloor production can cross over to become something bigger than its writers and singer ever thought possible
✍️ @HaroldHeathDJ
https://dj-m.ag/32VY2Z9
item.dc:creator: @DJmag
item.description:
‘Show Me Love’ demonstrated just how commercially successful vocal house music could be – how a decent song with dancefloor production can cross over to become something bigger than its writers and singer ever thought possible

✍️ @HaroldHeathDJ

item.title: R to @Annie3H: We’re still getting over the Drake album 😬
item.dc:creator: @HaroldHeathDJ

item.title: And lo, so it came to be, that the era of Kate Bush re-edits ended as quickly as it had come, swept away by a tidal wave of Drake tech house re-edits
item.dc:creator: @HaroldHeathDJ
item.description: And lo, so it came to be, that the era of Kate Bush re-edits ended as quickly as it had come, swept away by a tidal wave of Drake tech house re-edits

item.title:
Have you got your copy of @DiscoxPogo yet?
Look at it, it's lush, packed with excellent stuff including bits from me with @rawsilkdjs @mastersoundsuk Mark Archer from @WeAreAltern8 and @ErisDrew -
Viva acid house! 🙂❤️🔊
https://www.discopogo.co
item.dc:creator: @HaroldHeathDJ

item.title:
RT by @HaroldHeathDJ: ☀️ @DJRONTRENT and @Khruangbin 's "Flos Potentia" is a track you can "slip in the mix at 8am as the rays from the morning sun light up the rave and it might just create one of those unforgettable dance floor moments." By @HaroldHeathDJ 🫶
https://5mag.us/warm
item.dc:creator: @5Magazine
item.description:

item.title:
"We are currently experiencing a higher than normal volume of thoughts so please expect a delayed response"
- me, whenever anyone talks to me when I'm doing one other tiny thing
item.dc:creator: @HaroldHeathDJ
